food.name: Бекон, все куски, без добавления приправ, приготовленный

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS. This food remains low in FODMAPs in a serving size of up to 500 grams.

This food is high in protein and fat and contains minimal carbohydrate (FODMAPs). Fat can affect gut motility and when consumed in excess can be an additional symptom trigger. Do not add high FODMAP foods when cooking (eg. garlic and onion).
serves.title: 1 порция (2 полоски)

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This food is high in protein and does not contain carbohydrates (FODMAPs). Nutritional guidelines recommend that on average per day you should eat 2-3 serves of protein sources. Do not add high FODMAP foods when cooking (e.g. garlic and onion).
serves.title: 1 порция (1 небольшой отруб)

food.name: Сардины в масле, консервированные в рассоле, процеженные

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This food is high in protein and does not contain carbohydrates (FODMAPs). Nutritional guidelines recommend that on average per day you should eat 2-3 serves of protein sources. Check the ingredients list for added high FODMAP ingredients (e.g. garlic and onion).
serves.title: 1 порция (110 г)

serves.comment:
This serving size is low in FODMAPs and should be tolerated by most individuals with IBS.

This food is high in protein and fat and contains minimal carbohydrate (FODMAPs). Fat can affect gut motility and when consumed in excess can be an additional symptom trigger. Do not add high FODMAP foods when cooking (eg. garlic and onion).

Please note: Some of the brands tested for this product contained small amounts of garlic and or onion. If you are sensitive to fructans from onions/garlic we recommend you limit intake to the 'green' serve size provided. Be cautious when using these types of products as the amount of garlic and or onion added can vary.
serves.title: 1 порция (1 сосиска)

serves.comment: This serving size contains moderate amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.
serves.title: Умеренное количество (8 сосисок)

serves.comment: This serving size contains high amounts of FODMAPs. Intake may trigger symptoms if you malabsorb any of the indicated FODMAPs.
serves.title: Большая порция (10 сосисок)
